nodes.heading: Part B Definitions
nodes.section_path: SPACE FOR ENDORSEMENTS > Part B Definitions

nodes.name: Carcinoma-in-situ
nodes.description: A histologically proven, localized pre-invasion lesion where cancer cells have not yet penetrated the basement membrane.

nodes.name: TNM Staging
nodes.description: A classification system for staging cancer.

nodes.name: FIGO
nodes.description: Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique, a staging method.

nodes.name: breast
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: corpus uteri
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: vagina
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: vulva
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: fallopian tubes
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: cervix uteri
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: ovary
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Colon and rectum
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Penis
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Testis
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Lung
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Liver
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Stomach and esophagus
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: Urinary tract
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: bladder
nodes.description: An organ where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.name: nasopharynx
nodes.description: An organ group where carcinoma-in-situ can occur.

nodes.id: entity:a histologically proven, localized pre-invasion lesion
nodes.name: a histologically proven, localized pre-invasion lesion

nodes.heading: Early Stage Cancer
nodes.section_path: SPACE FOR ENDORSEMENTS > Part B Definitions > Early Stage Cancer

nodes.name: Early Stage Cancer
nodes.description: The presence of certain malignant conditions.

nodes.name: Tumour of the thyroid
nodes.description: Histologically classified as T1N0M0 according to the TNM classification.

nodes.name: Prostate tumour
nodes.description: Histologically described as TNM Classification T1a or T1b or T1c.

nodes.name: Chronic lymphocytic leukaemia
nodes.description: Classified as RAI Stage I or II.

nodes.id: entity:basal cell and squamous skin cancer
nodes.name: Basal cell and squamous skin cancer
nodes.description: That has spread to distant organs beyond the skin.

nodes.name: Hodgkin's lymphoma
nodes.description: Stage I by the Cotswolds classification staging system.

nodes.name: Major Cancer
nodes.description: A malignant tumour characterised by uncontrolled growth and spread of malignant cells.

nodes.name: leukemia
nodes.description: Included in the term cancer.

nodes.name: lymphoma
nodes.description: Included in the term cancer.

nodes.name: sarcoma
nodes.description: Included in the term cancer.

nodes.name: Carcinoma in situ of breasts
nodes.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

nodes.name: Cervical dysplasia CIN-1, CIN-2 & CIN-3
nodes.description: Excluded from the diagnosis of Major Cancer.

nodes.name: invasive malignant melanoma
nodes.description: The only skin cancer included in the diagnosis.

nodes.name: Gleason score
nodes.description: A scoring system for prostate tumours.

nodes.name: Chronic lymphocyctic leukaemia
nodes.description: Less than RAI stage 3 is excluded.

nodes.name: urinary bladder
nodes.description: Tumours histologically classified as T1N0M0 or below are excluded.

nodes.name: Carcinoma-in-situ (CIS)
nodes.description: A specific type of early-stage cancer covered under the policy.
